Uses of Interface
org.elkoserver.foundation.net.MessageHandler

  • Packages that use MessageHandler 
    Package Description
    org.elkoserver.foundation.actor
    Elko server classes representing entities with remote connections to a server.
    org.elkoserver.foundation.net
    Classes for message communication over the TCP and HTTP for Elko.
    org.elkoserver.foundation.server
    Core common server implementation classes for Elko.
    org.elkoserver.server.context
    The Elko Context Server.
    org.elkoserver.server.workshop
    The Elko Workshop Server.

    • Uses of MessageHandler in org.elkoserver.foundation.actor

      Classes in org.elkoserver.foundation.actor that implement MessageHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Actor
      An object representing some entity interacting with this server (whatever server this is) over the net.
      class  NonRoutingActor
      An Actor that receives untargeted JSON messages over its connection.
      class  RoutingActor
      An Actor that receives targeted JSON messages over its connection.

    • Uses of MessageHandler in org.elkoserver.foundation.net

      Classes in org.elkoserver.foundation.net that implement MessageHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NullMessageHandler
      "Message handler" for connections that are send only.
      Methods in org.elkoserver.foundation.net that return MessageHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageHandler MessageHandlerFactory.provideMessageHandler(Connection connection)
      Provide a message handler for a new connection.
